name: Rampage Ball 2048
description:
"Rampage Ball 2048" is a classic Arkanoid game with RPG elements.
Upgrade the ball and crush blocks.

Earn experience points to level up and earn ability points.
Upgrade the ball from ability points.
Blocks increase life every three levels.
You can upgrade in three ways:
- Damage Boost
- Critical Damage
- Split level
As you level up, the game becomes like an Idle arcade game.
Have fun!
